version_description:
Thank you for updating to the latest version of TextArt. What’s new on TextArt:

- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Layout update for new iOS version

Thanks for creating with TextArt! We regularly release updates to improve your experience.

If you'd like our help with any issues, please send us an email to: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Correct text layout of non-latin languages
- Improve performance

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Support solid background-color
- Optimize editor layout
- Support dark mode

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Fix text setting bugs

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Add more graphics to take your artwork event further
- Allow to move the overlay layer up
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Add Text Free feature
- Allow color picker by input Hex string and RGB values
- Fix bug shadow

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Fix input text size setting
- Fix blurry text template in iPad

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Fix a template minor bug

Download and enjoy now!

If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: the.ffff.studio@gmail.com

Thanks for using TextArt! What's new on this version:

- Shadow & shear tools for stickers
- Fix bug load previous project

One more thing…
If you love TextArt, please rate us on the App Store! We’ll be forever thankful to you.

With love,
The TextArt Team
